data.title: Local current time of Flagstaff, Eastern Cape, South Africa, Africa
data.meta_description: Find the current and exact local time of Flagstaff, Eastern Cape, South Africa, Africa, the sunrise and sunset time and the corresponding time zone.
data.text:
What is the time zone of Flagstaff, Eastern Cape? The answer is Africa/Johannesburg.

The current time of Flagstaff, Eastern Cape has a difference of 2 hours compared to the Greenwich Mean Time zone (GMT) at a longitude of 0 degree.

Geographical coordinates of the city (Flagstaff)

Latitude: -31.08042

Longitude: 29.49522

Sun relative's information

The following informations are estimates of the appearance and disappearance of the upper edge or upper limb of the Sun circle. They are based on the sunrise and sunset of the time zone's geographical coordinates. As the land is not always regular, it's practically impossible to get the exact time of the viewer's sun vision.
